backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a game platform backend with user profiles, experiences (games), authorization mixins, blob storage, and query/update methods for managing experiences, user settings, and profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the replacement of a header logo image element with an uploaded image.png stored as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files describing the React application structure with TanStack Router, authentication, experiences, and profile management.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes, including color variables for UI components, charts, sidebar, and custom properties for radius and borders.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Dini.Verse application with viewport meta tags, favicon reference, and root div mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with all application routes (home, discover, profile, create, settings, etc.), ThemeProvider forced to light mode, and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccountsDis: Card component displaying a login required notice with navigation buttons to login and signup pages for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthButtons: Authentication control buttons component showing Login/Sign Up buttons when logged out and a single Logout button when authenticated, with loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireProf: Authentication guard component that wraps protected content, displaying a login prompt card with navigation buttons for unauthenticated users and loading spinner during auth checks.
frontend/src/components/create/builder2d: Canvas component for 2D builder that handles drag-and-drop positioning and corner-based resizing of elements with mouse event handlers.
File upload component that allows users to select and upload image files as decals to the 2D builder.
UI controls for managing element z-order (bring forward, send backward) and deletion of selected elements.
Panel displaying sliders and inputs to edit selected element properties including position, opacity, rotation, color, and dimensions.
Panel for saving, loading, importing, exporting, and deleting reusable prop compositions with dialog-based workflows.
Palette of buttons to add basic shapes (rectangle, circle, triangle) to the 2D builder canvas.
frontend/src/components/experiences/Crea: Follow/unfollow button for creators with authentication checks and self-follow prevention.
frontend/src/components/experiences/Expe: Card component displaying experience thumbnail, title, description, and creator with hover effects and navigation to detail page.
Grid layout component that displays experience cards with loading skeletons and empty state handling.
Thumbs up/down rating buttons for experiences with authentication checks and vote count display.
frontend/src/components/experiences/InGa: Provides an in-game menu overlay with options to leave the game, reset character position, and access settings (placeholder). Uses dialogs and alert dialogs for confirmation flows.
frontend/src/components/experiences/Publ: Dialog form for publishing new experiences with fields for title, description, category, gameplay controls, and thumbnail upload. Handles file upload with progress tracking and creates experiences via mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout wrapper that combines SiteHeader, LeftSidebar, SiteFooter, and renders child routes via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/layout/AuthChang: Displays an informational alert banner notifying users about on-platform authentication availability and external login restrictions.
frontend/src/components/layout/LeftSideb: Navigation sidebar for desktop view with links to Profile, Social, Inventory, Groups, and Settings pages, each with corresponding icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer component displaying copyright information and a 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header with logo, navigation links (Home, Discover, Avatar Shop, Create, Dini Bucks), authentication buttons, and responsive mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileH: Displays user profile header with avatar, display name, and action buttons to navigate to Discover or publish experiences. Handles loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/social/Following: Shows a list of followed creators with avatars and unfollow buttons. Fetches followed creators and individual user profiles, displaying loading skeletons and empty states.
frontend/src/components/social/FriendsPa: React component for managing friends: search users, send/accept/decline friend requests, view friends list, and unfriend users with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/social/MessagesP: React component for direct messaging: search and select users, view message threads, and send messages with a two-column layout (conversations list and chat view).
frontend/src/components/social/PartiesPa: Placeholder component displaying a 'coming soon' message for the party system feature where users will be able to create groups and join games together.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccountSettings.ts: React Query hooks for managing user account settings including display name, avatar, and visibility preferences with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, automatically invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBuilder2D.ts: Custom hook managing 2D builder state for shapes and decals with operations like add, select, update, delete, reorder, and z-index manipulation.
frontend/src/hooks/useBuilder2DProps.ts: Custom hook for saving, loading, deleting, exporting, and importing 2D builder props (collections of elements) to/from localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Simple wrapper hook that extracts and returns current user authentication state from useSessionAuth.
frontend/src/hooks/useExperiences.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and managing experiences (getAllExperiences, searchExperiences, getExperiencesByAuthor, getExperiencesByCategory, getTrendingExperiences) and mutations for creating and rating experiences (not yet implemented in backend).
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication using @dfinity/auth-client, providing a React context and hook (useInternetIdentity) for login, logout, identity management, and authentication status tracking with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Consolidates React Query hooks for user profiles (getCallerUserProfile, saveCallerUserProfile) and experiences (getAllExperiences, getExperiencesByCategory, getTrendingExperiences, searchExperiences, getExperience, createExperience, rateExperience), with most mutations marked as not yet implemented in backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionAuth.ts: Provides session-based authentication hooks with login, signup, and logout functionality using session tokens stored in localStorage; currently uses placeholder implementations as backend methods are not yet available.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialFollowing.ts: Defines placeholder React Query hooks for creator following functionality (getFollowedCreators, followCreator, unfollowCreator, getFollowerCount, isFollowing) that are disabled until backend implementation is complete.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialFriends.ts: Provides React Query hooks for friend management (getFriendsList, getPendingFriendRequests, sendFriendRequest, respondToFriendRequest, unfriend) with all backend methods marked as not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialMessages.ts: Defines React Query hooks for direct messaging (getMessages, sendMessage) with a local Message type definition; backend methods are not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialParties.ts: Provides a placeholder hook (useGetCurrentParty) for party/group system functionality that is disabled until backend implementation is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDiscovery.ts: Defines a disabled useSearchUsers hook for user discovery functionality that awaits backend implementation of session-based user search.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile operations (get current user, get user by principal, sign up) that are currently disabled and return null, awaiting backend session authentication implementation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global CSS with Tailwind imports, custom CSS variables for theming (colors, spacing, borders), and base styles using the Outfit and Builder Sans font families.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/src/pages/AvatarShop.tsx: Displays a placeholder avatar shop page with category cards (Clothing, Accessories, Premium Items, Animations) and a "Coming Soon" message indicating the shop is under development.
frontend/src/pages/Create.tsx: Landing page for creation tools with two main cards: one for creating games/experiences using a 2D builder, and another for creating UGC accessories, each navigating to their respective creation pages.
Full 2D game builder interface with a three-panel layout: left sidebar for shapes/decals/layers, center canvas for building, and right sidebar toggling between properties and props panels.
Placeholder page for UGC accessories creation displaying a "Coming Soon" message with a back button to return to the main Create page.
frontend/src/pages/DiniBucks.tsx: Virtual currency page showing user balance (if authenticated), login/signup prompts for unauthenticated users, and feature cards describing how to earn, spend, trade, and use premium Dini Bucks.
frontend/src/pages/Discover.tsx: Main discovery page for browsing and searching user-created experiences with category tabs (Adventure, Roleplay, Simulator), trending section, and a publish dialog for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/ExperienceDetails.tsx: Detailed view page for individual experiences showing metadata, creator info, play button, rating controls, and simulated gameplay state with in-game menu.
frontend/src/pages/Groups.tsx: Placeholder page for groups feature displaying an empty state with messaging about joining communities.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page showing personalized welcome card for authenticated users, recommended experiences grid, and friend activity sidebar.
frontend/src/pages/Inventory.tsx: Placeholder page for user inventory displaying an empty state for items, accessories, and collectibles.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login form page with username/password fields, error handling, and link to signup page using session authentication.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: User profile page wrapped in RequireProfile guard showing avatar, display name, username, and account information with edit/settings buttons.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page component that allows authenticated users to manage their profile (display name, avatar upload/deletion), account visibility, and password, with mutation hooks for updates and delete confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/SignUp.tsx: Sign-up page component with form validation for username, display name, and password fields, using the useSessionAuth hook to create new user accounts.
frontend/src/pages/Social.tsx: Social hub page with tabbed interface for Friends, Messages, Parties, and Following panels, requiring authentication to access.
frontend/src/utils/formatError.ts: Utility function that normalizes various error types (Error objects, strings, backend trap errors) into user-friendly English messages for display.
frontend/src/utils/sessionToken.ts: Utility functions for managing session tokens in localStorage with get, set, and clear operations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter utilities for extracting query parameters from both regular and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup functions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH, container settings, font families (Builder Sans, Outfit), and animation keyframes for the UI.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking feature requests to update the welcome message with authenticated user's display name (AR-1) and replace header logo with uploaded image (completed feature).
